A technique that allows the user to fuse with water, even in water as shallow as a puddle.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 9, page 17</ref> By doing so, the user can take advantage of their hidden presence and launch a surprise attack on their target. 

== Trivia ==
* In later anime appearances, when the user comes out of concealment, water rises up around them before they are revealed.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 85</ref><ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 188</ref>
* A member of the [[Nokizaru Group]] made use of this technique.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 287</ref>
